## Point.removeTag() method

Removes a tag with the specified name if it exists; otherwise, it does nothing.

**Signature:**

```typescript
removeTag(name: string): Point;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The name of the tag to be removed. |

**Returns:**

[Point](./influxdb3-client.point.md)
